description: And its open source and free! What?!
The fact that this game is F2P and open source and this high quality is crazy. Highly recommend.
It is about 900 mb and it's been hanging at 2 mb for like 10 mins or so. Not playable atm.
summary: It needs to download additional packages

description: launched on Manjaro Phosh on the pinephone (beta 12 I believe?) but was unable to download the update on launch, will keep installed for now and hope to see a fix. This looks very promising and I look forward to playing it!
exact same errors as before EONOT? or something like that. this looks neat, but so far ive no idea if it is or not. cant update or play offline.
Lots of good unit control in the interface.

This is one of the most hard-core RTS games ever, where the very first combat unit can destroy your entire resource pipeline in the time it takes to build one counter-unit. There are also to many unit types and factories, making things more complex then necessary. Last but not least, multiplayer is a total slaughterfest with lots of cheesy tactics and arbitrary rule changes, that make it impossible to recommend for casual players.

If all of this sounds like great selling points, then go at it, but I would not recommend it for anybody who only plays RTS games casually.
summary: Works, looks good, but is not made for mere mortals

description: Fantastic game. Very high quality graphics and huge armyes and good Ai.
FPS is too low, and game is generally super laggy but the gameplay is super fun and the fps problems could be fixed in an future update!
summary: Great game, 10/10 but need some serious optimization

description: It's a really fun game, but it is quite the task on the hardware. It requires a pretty beefy CPU to run the game and it is not to be played on a potato computer. Maybe if the performance was better on lower end hardware I would rate it higher, but overall fantastic game nevertheless. Thank God I have a pretty powerful computer and can actually run this game well.
Can't wait for the full release. Really appreciate the linux support.
love this game has all of ta with few extras to expand on the game , and such a small download

This is an amazing take on the classic Total Annihilation, the grandfather of many of todays biggest RTS games like supreme commander, planetary annihilation, ashes of singularity, grey goo etc. 

This may be the closest thing we will get to a remake of TA. There's still plenty for the devs to do but they're doing it !
The game works great and is still receving updates!

A really good rtx game and work well on linux.
But I have to enable fullscreen mode in wayland otherwise the graphic is broken for some reason.
Best RTS I have ever played and its free!
Maybe the best for Linux ??

Lobby (menu) UI is a bit ugly but it's being reimplemented brand new. The game itself is beautiful, massive scale, up to 16v16 matches, really hard Barbarian AI, two additional game modes (scavengers and raptors), great community, responsive devs...
In the dark age of RTS scarcity, it's like a life-bringing beam of light!

It is hard to get bored with BAR. In many RTS games I've played the number of possible tactics to win the game were limited. In BAR you have many options to choose from especially when playing against human opponent. If you like RTS games and want to have fun with increasing level of difficulties try it.

And beware it is addictive!
the only real successor to Total annihilation.

takes too long to switch between groups of units and without being able to slow down it's too difficult to constantly look for my units, wait for them to move to do anything while try to figure out what to do as they end up idling a majority of the time since there's no easy way to realize or notice they're doing nothing. i push on fight and they just sit there. would be helpful to get mini-screens of their progress like little progress reports in real time, be able to give them a todo list like do this then this instead of outright canceling it and add simpler functions like a seek and destroy button or aything to make it more straight forward. i like rts games but this one feels overly simplified yet overly complicated. like it requires you to do so much while also being restricted to such simple commands that it's just too much to do.

The UI is cluttered, the unit roster is larger than it needs to be, and there is a lot of meta that is totally unclear to the casual user.

Sadly, I did comment on this two years ago and they haven't really addressed any of these problems... This is a carbon copy of Total Annihilation from 20 years ago, flaws and all.
gameplay and graphics are good

Best F&OS RTS. Best gameplay, and runs fine on strong PCs. Thanks for the game!

On other reviews:
This can take a while to download, but that's because it's a game that has a lot of stuff in it, try increasing your network connection speed if you can. Game ran fine.
Gives access to client and allows it to fetch updates ffrom github archive. Flawless in my experience.
Stellar graphics, dynamic and complex but intuitive gameplay with a wonderful and vibrant community.
summary: One of the greatest RTS games I've ever played

description: Amazing game. Looks great, preforms great and the community is great.
true spiritual sucessor of the TA/BA line

Very complex and large scale RTS game with well balanced factions and units, offering easy-to-learn and adaptive as well as combat effective controls and automations. All this with polished artwork and design that makes you hit the pause key and just admire the graphics every now and then.
summary: Awesome RTS with great gameplay depth

description:
Dans l’ensemble l'idée est bonne, le jeu à l'air sympa, il fonctionne trés bien sur 22.04, graphiquement il est loin d'etre vilain. 

Je n'ai cependant pas tout compris, le Français n'est pas inclus dans le choix des langues ( il n'y a pas de choix juste l'anglais en fait ), c'est bien dommage car il demande quand même une certaine complexité sur la compréhension du gameplay. 

Un jour peut-être 

Merci pour ce jeu, bonne continuation !

Un très bon jeu de stratégie, de nombreuses tactiques disponibles pour un gameplay se renouvelant toujours.

Possibilité de jouer en solo (contre une IA) ou en multijoueur.
De nombreuses unités uniques.
Des graphismes de qualité pour des performances au rendez-vous

Merci pour ce jeu que je recommande sans hésitation !

Игра недоделанная . В "single player" cильное неравенство user vs AI. Юзеру надо скролировать и масштабировать экран, действовать последовательно. AI нет небходимости управлять обзором (экраном), он "видит" весь регион. И управляет юнитами параллельно. Таки поставил 4 балла, цель-то правильная

Очень глубокая ртс-ка с красивой графикой, самой разной техникой и способами ведения боя. Для бесплатного и открытого проекта игра ооочень хорошо продумана. Всегда как надо работает выделение юнитов по типу, сами юнити никогда не тупят, и часто делают очевидные вспомогательные вещи без лишних кликов.
Игра на столько хорошо работает, что я хочу оставить тут несколько примеров:
1) В ситуации, когда мне нужно было выделить бомбардировщиков над другими моими юнитами, игра никогда не ошибалась
2) То же самое касается наземных военных юнитов вперемешку с строителями: игра выделяет то, что нужно
3) Сами строители, когда спавнятся, сразу ставятся на помощь конструктору для ускорения производства юнитов
4) У юнитов достаточно тонкая настройка поведения, но даже по умолчанию они ведут себя вполне адекватно: не игнорируют огонь врага, всегда атакуют кого-то, проезжая мимо. Разве что не хватает режима конвоя для юнитов с разной скоростью, но не удивлюсь, что я его просто не заметил
5) Простые боты в игре не наглеют, научиться играть в ртс в этой игре гораздо проще, чем в других подобных бесплатных проектах
6) Если хочется раскрыть все механики игры, можно настроить бота так, как тебе хочется
В общем, в эту игру и этот движок вложено столько усилий, что они заслуживают внимания
